divs: sighting details while visiting daughter in north carolina we were sitting outside having a b-b-q around 7pm. i had been looking up at how clear the 1\2 moon looked when i noticed an object come around from the backside of the moon, from the dark side and head earthward when it got around front. the object was bright, like a star, and not much bigger as i could see it. it traveled from left to right circling the moon and heading downward when it came around the front. if you were to animate the whole scene it would look like an object was sent from the back of the moon around the front and downward towards the earth. my exact word when i saw it was "nice!"
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Asheville
There were no other sightings in Asheville on or around October 29th 2009
Summary: It came around from the back of the moon
